text_block_list.text:
Summer Training Camp――Bubble Gum Fellow's training was going well. 
After finishing the morning training menu and reviewing……
choice_data_list: As planned, you're off this afternoon

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Thanks. 
Hey, Trainer-san, this afternoon do you have some time?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad. 
Then, let's go exploring!

『Let's both put on our swimsuits and meet on the beach!』 
was what she told me, and I had just made it to the beach――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Over there, can you see that cave on the edge of the beach? 
I heard there's some spectacular scenery in there.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
I only heard it from some people in my hometown 
but, supposedly, once you exit that cave, the 
ocean is pretty amazing……according to rumors.
choice_data_list: "The ocean is amazing"? In what way……?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Who knows? Sounds like nobody from the academy has been there. 
That's why, let's go and be the first ones!

That was some pretty flimsy info. Normally, I would be 
pretty uneasy about exploring based only on that. But――

If I went together with Bubble Gum Fellow, then there was 
no doubt we'd find that amazing ocean――I was sure of that.

The inside of the cave was quiet, and with no light shining 
in, it was difficult to see our footing. The internal structure 
of the cave didn't seem that complicated though……

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, watch your step. 
There's a bit of a dip here.

Trusting the words of Bubble Gum Fellow who was leading, 
we proceeded deeper and deeper, step by step……

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Ah, does that look like light over there? 
If we go a little further――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Waah, amazing! 
This, is the light reflecting off the rocks……?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
……but, this isn't really an 『Ocean』 right? 
I'm guessing that the 『Amazing』 part is further ahead.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Fufu, c'mon, let's go!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Wah, amazing……!

The ocean was beautiful. The water was clear and 
tranquil. Light and dark blue, with a mix of emerald 
green……it was something that could move the heart.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
It's pretty……and it kind of feels like a secret base too. 
――An ocean just for us.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Alright, since we're here, let's go for a dive!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to go take a look at the bottom! 
Just wait here!
(Splash!)

With a big leap, Bubble Gum Fellow dove in to the water. 
I guess I'll just have to wait……

Was the water really so deep here? 
I was starting to get a little worried, but then――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: ――It's amazing, Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
There's a really beautiful place down there. 
I'm sure that place is that 『Amazing』 part!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
I want Trainer-san to see it too. 
――Hey, how about diving with me?

From what I could tell, it seemed like it'd be quite a 
deep dive. Honestly……it was scary. In the first place, 
I didn't think I could make it by swimming on my own……

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Uneasy?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaa! I figured, since we'd have to dive pretty deep. 
But……

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: ――I believe in you. If it's you, you can do it.

Her words full of conviction gave me courage. 
『You can do it』……if she says that then――I can believe her.
I'll give it a try. No――
choice_data_list: I'll do it. I believe you!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: Yeah, that's the spirit!

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Okay, take my hand. 
I'll take you to that 『Amazing』 place!
(Splash!)

Bubble Gum Fellow pulled me by the hand as we dove 
deeper and deeper. The deeper we went, the more the 
light receded and the deeper the blue became……

Bubble Gum Fellow gestured to try and tell me something. 
When I looked to where she was pointing――

――There, spreading out before me, was a spectacular 
scene that I had never seen before.

The sunlight was filtering down and making the water 
seem to sparkle. The brightly colored corals were 
in full bloom, and many beautiful fish swam about.
(Splash!)

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: How was it? Beautiful, right!?

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
Wasn't it!? Ahahaa! You can't really say anything other 
than 『Amazing』, it was just that beautiful! Hahahaa――

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: ――See? Just like I thought.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
If it's you, you can dive right in. 
To that 『Amazing』 scenery, you could make it.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
I believe in myself. Because I'm like this, 
you can always believe in me, right? That's why……

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: I believe in you too.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
I can do anything. And if you're with me, we can do anything. 
――I wanted to show you that. That's why I brought you here.

Bubble Gum Fellow's gaze fell on me, straight-forward 
and sincere……I could feel a warmth in my chest.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text:
You can, you can do anything. 
The two of us will make it happen.

text_block_list.name: Bubble Gum Fellow
text_block_list.text: You and me, if we're together, then for sure.

Bubble Gum Fellow's words were always filled with 
conviction. If we're together, we can do anything―― 
I also could believe it from the bottom of my heart.
